General.Name: Trailbreaker Resources Ltd
General.Description: Trailbreaker Resources Ltd., operates as a mineral exploration company, focuses on the acquisition, evaluation, exploration, and development of mineral assets in Canada. The company's flagship property comprises the Atsutla gold project that consists of 36 mineral tenures covering approximately 40,000 hectares located in the northwestern British Columbia. It also holds interests in various mineral properties located in British Columbia and in Yukon Territory, Canada. The company was formerly known as Goldstrike Resources Ltd. and changed its name to Trailbreaker Resources Ltd. in March 2021. Trailbreaker Resources Ltd. was incorporated in 1989 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 650 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6B 4N9
